Rocky start set WTO talks up for minimal resultsIt was billed as the "reform ministerial" that could lay a platform for updated global trading rules fit for modern challenges, from climate change to rising agricultural and industrial subsidies. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 21:58:50 GMT ZTCCZ7VWAJIO7NMYP7QAPWP32I https://www.reuters.com/world/rocky-start-set-wto-talks-up-minimal-results-2024-03-01/Emma Farge, Rachna Uppal世界
Exclusive: Nissan, Fisker in advanced talks on investment, partnership-sourcesNissan is in advanced talks to invest in electric vehicle maker Fisker in a deal that could provide the Japanese automaker with access to an electric pickup truck while giving the struggling startup a financial lifeline, according to two people familiar with the negotiations. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 19:53:24 GMT XBXFK75ENNNQHPAUPBO2J2BAE4 https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/nissan-fisher-advanced-talks-investment-partnership-sources-2024-03-01/Abhirup Roy, Norihiko Shirouzu商业汽车与交通
The politics and economics behind Biden's China-car espionage probePresident Joe Biden, vowing to "do right by U.S. auto workers," launched an investigation this week into whether Chinese-made vehicles could be used to spy on Americans, a far-off threat given the few such cars on U.S. roads now. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 18:32:34 GMT C5D73HTMH5LFZOUEKO4A52PTXY https://www.reuters.com/world/politics-economics-behind-the-knowledge-china-car-espionage-probe-2024-03-01/David Shepardson, Jarrett Renshaw, Michael Martina世界
Yellen says U.S. committed to G20 finance work despite divisions over war languageU.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Friday that Washington was strongly committed to G20 finance ministers' work, despite the group's failure to reach consensus on communique language regarding wars in Ukraine and Gaza. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 18:00:52 GMT WJMH4AHOFZKKHEKMDN4NODFM4E https://www.reuters.com/world/yellen-says-us-commited-g20-finance-work-despite-divisions-over-war-language-2024-03-01/Andrea Shalal世界
IM Motors raises $1.1 bln in one of China EV brands' biggest recent dealsIM Motors, a premium electric vehicle brand of state-owned Chinese automaker SAIC , said on Friday it has raised more than 8 billion yuan ($1.1 billion) to work on new smart car models and technologies. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 11:43:18 GMT AYUCNFWXVJNETBNBPG2SDTA7TQ https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/im-engines-raises-11-bln-one-china-ev-brands-biggest-recent-deals-2024-03-01/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China approves plan aimed at spurring investment and spendingChina's cabinet on Friday approved a plan aimed at promoting large-scale equipment upgrades and sales of consumer goods, state media reported.
